mapper.select: SELECT t.*, tc.`name` as 'taskCategoryName', dic.`name` as 'decideInfoCategoryName', count(ut.id) AS 'jiedanCount', c.name as 'cotaskName' FROM task t LEFT JOIN user_task ut ON t.id = ut.task_id LEFT JOIN cotasking c on t.cotasking_id = c.id LEFT JOIN task_category tc ON t.task_category_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN decide_info_category dic ON t.decide_info_category_id = dic.id LEFT JOIN user on user.id = t.create_user WHERE t.cotasking_id = #{id} and t.deleted = 0 group by t.id

SELECT t.*, count(ut.id) AS 'jiedanCount', c.name as 'cotaskName', tc.name as 'taskCategoryName', dic.name as 'decideInfoCategoryName',user.name as "createUserName" FROM task t LEFT JOIN user_task ut ON t.id = ut.task_id LEFT JOIN cotasking c on t.cotasking_id = c.id LEFT JOIN task_category tc on t.task_category_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN decide_info_category dic on t.decide_info_category_id = dic.id WHERE 1 = 1
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.deleted = 0 and t.status = 1 and (t.`open` = 1 or (t.`open` = 0 and t.policy = #{unit})) group by t.id
